name: Maze Roller (itch) (mw01)
description:
Try not to get lost inside the labyrinth. Hit the final point before time is up. Collect diamonds and upgrade the ball. Discover various themes and levels. Use one-finger joystick control to roll the ball.

Maze Roller is a fun and mind-storming 3D maze game with over 40 levels. Currently available on Android.

Download for free: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.moonwire.mazeroller
